channel.title: CVE Feed for Kubernetes -- minikube
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kubernetes -- minikube

item.title: CVE-2023-1174|2024-08-02T05:40:58.263Z -- kubernetes -- minikube
item.description: This vulnerability exposes a network port in minikube running on macOS with Docker driver that could enable unexpected remote access to the minikube container.

item.title: CVE-2023-1944|2024-08-02T06:05:27.072Z -- kubernetes -- minikube
item.description: This vulnerability enables ssh access to minikube container using a default password.
